content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 29}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in the crafting grid in a 2x2 shape. I will start by moving 1 blackstone from slot 29 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 3, "index": 29}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in the crafting grid in a 2x2 shape. I have placed 1 blackstone in slot 1, and will now place 1 blackstone in slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 2, "index": 29}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in the crafting grid in a 2x2 shape. I have placed 1 blackstone in slot 1, and 1 blackstone in slot 2. I will now place 1 blackstone in slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in the crafting grid in a 2x2 shape. I have placed 1 blackstone in slot 1, 1 blackstone in slot 2, and 1 blackstone in slot 4. I will now place 1 blackstone in slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 29 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: polished_blackstone
inventory=[{"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 14, "index": 24}, {"type": "blaze_powder", "quantity": 45, "index": 32}, {"type": "birch_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 35}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft polished_blackstone, I need to place 4 blackstone in the crafting grid in a 2x2 shape. I have placed 1 blackstone in slot 1, 1 blackstone in slot 2, 1 blackstone in slot 4, and 1 blackstone in slot 5. I will now move the polished_blackstone from slot 0 to slot 11.
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
